==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=红娘}}

===Etymology===
From the maidservant of Cui Yingying in ''{{w|Yingying's Biography}}'' ({{lang|zh|《鶯鶯傳》}}), who acts as a matchmaker for Cui Yingying and Scholar Zhang.
